EmailTemplate.subject: We need more info to assist you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for contacting {!Case.Business_Unit__c}. We’re ready to help you with your issue, but first we need some additional information. Please reply to the email we sent you five days ago within the next two days.
If for some reason you’re unable to locate our original email, contact us using the link below and and refer to case {!Case.CaseNumber}.
CONTACT US
Sincerely, {!Case.Business_Unit__c} Customer Service
{!Case.Thread_Id}
